bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: ND4J: BaseNDArray.castTo(DataType) should return this when correct dtype
bug.description: This is what we used to do, I don't know when/why it was changed. i.e., it should be a no-op if already correct type <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/nd4j/nd4j-backends/nd4j-api-parent/nd4j-api/src/main/java/org/nd4j/linalg/api/ndarray/BaseNDArray.java#L6496-L6506>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/master/nd4j/nd4j-backends/nd4j-api-parent/nd4j-api/src/main/java/org/nd4j/linalg/api/ndarray/BaseNDArray.java#L6496-L6506</denchmark-link>
